code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> Invited: Admin creates User
    Invited --> Active: User confirms email & sets password
    
    state "Profile Setup" as Setup {
        Active --> IncompleteProfile: First Login
        IncompleteProfile --> FillingData: User enters Bio/Phone
        FillingData --> ProfileSubmitted: Save Changes
    }

    ProfileSubmitted --> StudentActive: Assign to Cohort/Advisor
    
    state "Student Journey" as Journey {
        StudentActive --> InProgress: Starts Tasks
        InProgress --> Graduated: All Tasks Done
        InProgress --> DroppedOut: Admin Deactivates
    }

    Graduated --> Alumni: Final Status
    DroppedOut --> [*]

cscw_dialogue.utterance:
这里必须包含 * 和 Active --> IncompleteProfile: First Login
        IncompleteProfile --> FillingData: User enters Bio/Phone
        FillingData --> ProfileSubmitted: Save Changes
     这一块。

明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 '* 和 Active --> IncompleteProfile: First Login
        IncompleteProfile --> FillingData: User enters Bio/Phone
        FillingData --> ProfileSubmitted: Save Changes
    '？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]

        InProgress --> DroppedOut: Admin Deactivates
